title: LA-23-15: U.S. Office of Government Ethics Review of Nominees for Presidentially Appointed, Senate-Confirmed Positions
url: https://www.oge.gov/Web/oge.nsf/Legal Docs/2190D2188533B35185258A8B0073A5ED/$FILE/LA-23-15 - U.S. Office of Government Ethics Review of Nominees for Presidentially Appointed, Senate-Confirmed Positions.pdf?open
summary: The Legal Advisory discusses OGE’s approach to resolving potential conflicts of interest and other ethics issues for nominees for Presidentially appointed, Senate-confirmed positions.
